statements: SELECT * FROM performance_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM performance_data WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, session_id, performance_score FROM performance_data ORDER BY student_id, session_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(performance_score) AS max_score, MIN(performance_score) AS min_score FROM performance_data;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM performance_data GROUP BY session_id HAVING AVG(performance_score) > 80;
SELECT student_id, session_id, performance_score FROM performance_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY student_id ASC, session_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance WHERE date_recorded = '2022-10-15'
SELECT activity_name, difficulty_level FROM ActivityInformation WHERE activity_type = 'Math'
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT student_id, performance_score, date_recorded FROM StudentPerformance WHERE activity_id = 3
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance WHERE activity_id = 1 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT student_id, activity_id, performance_score, date_recorded FROM StudentPerformance WHERE date_recorded = '2022-02-15'
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_type FROM ActivityInformation WHERE difficulty_level < 5 ORDER BY activity_name
SELECT AVG(performance_score), MAX(performance_score), MIN(performance_score) FROM StudentPerformance
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM student_info WHERE student_id = 202;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM performance_data WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_name = 'Midterm' AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM assessment_results GROUP BY student_id, assessment_name;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM student_info WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT assessment_name, date, score FROM performance_data WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_info WHERE last_name = 'Smith');
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM assessment_results GROUP BY student_id, assessment_name;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM assessment_results GROUP BY student_id, assessment_name HAVING avg_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, date, performance_score FROM performance_data;
SELECT student_id, student_name, birthdate FROM student_details;
SELECT experience_id, experience_name, experience_type FROM educational_experiences;
SELECT improvement_id, student_id, improvement_category, improvement_value FROM improvement_tracking;
SELECT student_id, performance_score, date FROM performance_data;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_name, birthdate FROM student_details WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT experience_name, experience_type FROM educational_experiences WHERE experience_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT * FROM improvement_tracking WHERE improvement_category = 'Communication' ORDER BY improvement_value DESC;
SELECT student_id, date, performance_score FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM students JOIN student_scores ON students.student_id = student_scores.student_id;
SELECT lesson_id, topic, completion_status FROM lessons WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, grade_level, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM students JOIN student_scores ON students.student_id = student_scores.student_id GROUP BY student_name, grade_level HAVING AVG(score) > 70;
SELECT course_name, instructor, year FROM courses WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, score, timestamp FROM students JOIN student_scores ON students.student_id = student_scores.student_id WHERE score >= 80 AND student_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY score DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT course_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM courses JOIN student_scores ON courses.course_id = student_scores.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(score) < 60;
